Canonical: https://humanfactors.pro/
Owner: Brandon Fluegel, Ph.D.
Primary role: Human Factors UX Researcher

Summary:
This site is a portfolio focused on Human Factors research, Human-AI interaction,
UX research strategy, and measurable product impact across Amazon, Sling TV,
Uber, NASA, and Mercedes-Benz related work.

Core topics:
- Human Factors
- Human-AI Interaction
- UX Research
- Product Strategy
- Psychophysics
- Experimental Design
- Trust and system status in AI-assisted experiences
